name: Rope Drop
description:
Rope drop is a term familiar to theme park enthusiasts and means the time that the park opens. To "rope drop" a park is to be one of the first guests to enter the park. In the game Rope Drop you have one day in The Magical Realm theme park to ride as many rides as possible from rope drop at 7 am to park close at 9 pm.

To assist you in your quest, you have purchased the MagicPass+ service, which allows you to skip the line once at every ride. To do this, you must book a Golden Gateway for each ride. Once you have booked one Gateway, you can't book another until either you have used a Gateway, or two hours pass, whichever comes first.

Controls

Click on a ride to select it. You can then use your My Magical Experience mobile app to walk to the ride, book a Golden Gateway for the ride, or ride the ride.

Right-click and drag on the map to scroll it. Use the mouse wheel to zoom the map in and out.

Credits
Game Creator
Dave Schaub
